patthana15.67:4.1: Niyyānikaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naniyyāniko nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.67:4.2: Aniyyānikaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naniyyāniko nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.67:5.1: Aniyyānikaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naniyyāniko naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
